## Leslie Matrix Example

Model population changes using the same example we did in lecture.

```{r}

insect_leslie <- matrix(c(0, 0, 600, 0.2, 0, 0, 0, 0.08, 0),
                        nrow = 3, ncol = 3, byrow = TRUE)

insect_leslie

```
